Resume.Title: My name is Yaroslav.
Resume.AvatarCaption: The photo is outdated, it's time to update it
Resume.Lead: I am a web developer at ScienceSoft. I'm deaf, but it doesn't bother me much. I can communicate both in Russian sign language and voice.
Resume.About:
I started programming in 2011. I tried different directions, but chose frontend — everything related to web development, websites and everything that surrounds them. During this time, I have gained a lot of experience in programming and communicating with people. Now I am developing applications, creating a website, helping to improve the design, and also giving advice on self-development. I strive to create something useful and necessary for people.
In addition to work, I like to draw, do things with math and learn new technologies. I also love great coffee and minimalism.
Resume.Quote: If you want to feel human, <1>conquer<1/></1> your ailment.
